title: ChangeSetItemFactory

API > @ngrx/data

ChangeSetItemFactorylink

Factory to create a ChangeSetItem for a ChangeSetOperation

class ChangeSetItemFactory { add<T>(entityName: string, entities: T | T[]): ChangeSetAdd<T> delete(entityName: string, keys: string | number | string[] | number[]): ChangeSetDelete update<T extends { id: string | number; }>(entityName: string, updates: Update<T> | Update<T>[]): ChangeSetUpdate<T> upsert<T>(entityName: string, entities: T | T[]): ChangeSetUpsert<T> }
